reviewText: Peck is a sports writer on the road where he meets Bacall, falls in love and marries herdespite the fact that he has a fiancee at home. The rest of the movie focuses on his efforts to hide the relationship from his new wife. Oh yeah, and he is in trouble with the mob for writing unfavorably about them. Gregory Peck as the lead actor in a comedywhose idea what that? Hes not good. Bacall, howevershes good in anything. The film is a standard farce. Unless you are a huge fan of Peck or Bacall and have to see everything they're in, skip this one.
